data.price: 85.Nabiyow! koros cirdih rooci kinnim koo esserta, tokkel atu keenil gacisak: rooci Yi Rabbih amriiy usuk lenna taaxigem matan kaak sa, sin kee sinaamah inkih ixxigak tontocowwimem tu hinna dagom baxa akke waytek keenik ixxic.
data.arabic: وَيَسۡـَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلرُّوحِۖ قُلِ ٱلرُّوحُ مِنۡ أَمۡرِ رَبِّي وَمَآ أُوتِيتُم مِّنَ ٱلۡعِلۡمِ إِلَّا قَلِيلٗا

meta.transliteration: wayasalūnaka ʿani al-rūḥi quli al-rūḥu min amri rabbī wamā ūtītum mina al-ʿil'mi illā qalīlan

dua.name: Dua for Intellectual Humility
dua.significanceReason: Recognizes human limitations and seeks divine wisdom beyond human understanding.

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.
